1: <pb/><e>Bit yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>Jantakxa yailal max yaoc eb jiban ayon Israel on ti' yettaxc'al yichbanil. Jalokab axca ti' xin:</t>
2: <t>Xiwilxa yailal max yaoc eb jiban yettaxc'al yichbanil, palta c'am chi tzakay eb ajc'ul tu' ayon.</t>
3: <t>Max yasjitok jichin mak'on eb, txequelxac'al max yun yaxbi jichin yuj eb.</t>
4: <t>Axa Jehová xin, tojol ton Cham, max on is col Cham yul k'ab eb unem yobal tu'.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Elokab q'uixwil eb, elokab aj eb ajc'ul yin Sión.</t>
6: <t>Yunokab el eb axca an ac'un chi ch'ib yibanlak na; a yet c'amtoc'al chi oclay ajtek an, cax chi takilok.</t>
7: <t>A an ac'un tu', c'am chi wajnaj yul co k'ab, tamwal chi c'al-lay yin topanil.</t>
8: <t>Tokwal a yet chi eq'uel junok anima cax chi yalon yin an: Yak'okab Jehová watx'c'ulal yin. Ayon ti' chi co k'an watx'c'ulal Cham yin, man ẍiok eb.</t>
